reviewText: My grand children LOVE Magic School Bus and it has been a great learning tool for them.
Great deal.
my son loves this show! it's educational & entertaining. I even learn from it

This is a review by a 6yo kid. I love this show because they can shrink and I would love to have a magic school bus. When I start going to sleep I imagine that I was one of the kids in Magic School Bus and that I was shrinking with them. I have watched Season 1 and about a quarter of Season 2.
Great
My kids love this show.  The only reason I gave it a 3 star is because you can't but the season you have to by episode by episode and it's a littler over 2x as expensive as just buying a season.
